CustomField.description: Estimated cost or risk value per detected incident. Used to calculate ROI and display "Estimated Savings" on the dashboard. For example, a stale opportunity might have a Cost_Per_Incident of $500 representing at-risk revenue.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Estimated cost/risk per incident for ROI calculations (e.g., $500 for at-risk opportunity)
CustomField.label: Cost Per Incident
